name: Channel Incentive Playbook
overview: The Channel Incentive Playbook is an online resource created for channel marketing professionals by Loyaltyworks, a leading provider of channel incentive and loyalty solutions. With over 30 years of experience in channel and incentive marketing, we offer solutions that create competitive differentiation by engaging channel partners and end-users in branded, Web-based reward programs that drive sales revenue, increase market share, strengthen partner relationships, gather insightful customer data and improve overall marketing effectiveness.
